titleStmt.title: An order of Parliament for the putting in due execution through out the whole Kingdome the statutes made for the observation of the Sabath day as also an order of the Lord Major to the aldermen of the severall wards in the city of London, to see the sayd statutes put in execution in their sayd wards.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
